content: निलयः {@--1@} A hiding place, the lair or den of animals, a nest (of birds); <ls>Śi. 9. 4.</ls> {@--2@} An abode, residence, house, dwelling; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘living or residing in’. {@--3@} Hiding oneself. {@--4@} Total destruction. {@--5@} Setting, disappearance; दिनांते निलयाय गंतुं <ls>R. 2. 15</ls> (where the word is used in sense 1 also).
